overview: Evan Falchuk leads Best Doctors internal and public strategy. Falchuk joined Best Doctors in 1999 and has held various positions at Best Doctors including general counsel. From 1994 to 1999, Evan was an attorney with Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver and Jacobson in Washington, DC in the firm’s SEC enforcement practice. He is a Phi Beta Kappa graduate of Lehigh University with a degree in History and earned his JD from the University of Pennsylvania Law School. Evan has been quoted and appeared in many media outlets, including The Wall Street Journal, CNN, Forbes, Investor’s Business Daily, and on Fox’s Cavuto, as well as numerous regional and business publications and blogs.
